inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Count by System Events
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet'
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Fortigate'
| summarize NumberOfEvent=count() by Activity
| extend Category= extract('(.*):(.*)$',1,Activity)
| extend B= extract('(.*):(.*$)',2,Activity)
| extend SubCategory= extract('([a-zA-Z/-]*).*$',1,B)
| extend SubType= extract('([a-zA-Z/-]*) (.*)$',2,B)
| where SubCategory contains 'system' and SubType !in ('','perf-stats')
| project SubType, NumberOfEvent

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Logs Received By time  
CommonSecurityLog 
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet'  
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Fortigate'  
| summarize LogsCount=count() by TimeGenerated

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Total Traffic Sent vs Received in Mega Bytes 
CommonSecurityLog 
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet'  
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Fortigate' 
| summarize SentDataMB = sum(SentBytes)/1048576 , DataRecievedMB =sum(ReceivedBytes)/1048576 by TimeGenerated

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Total Forward Traffic Sent vs Received
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet'
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Fortigate'
| summarize SentDataMB = sumif(SentBytes,Activity contains 'forward' )/1048576 , DataRecievedMB =sumif(ReceivedBytes, Activity contains 'forward')/1048576 by TimeGenerated

content.PartTitle: Forward data flow volume, by time

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//By severity
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet'
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Fortigate'
| summarize SeverityCount=count() by LogSeverity , TimeGenerated

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//System Add Vs Delete Vs Edit Vs Move
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet'
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Fortigate'
| where Activity contains 'system'
| where Activity contains 'add' or Activity contains 'delete' or Activity contains 'move' or Activity contains 'edit'
| summarize EventCount = count() by Activity
| extend Category= extract('(.*):(.*)$',1,Activity)
| extend B= extract('(.*):(.*$)',2,Activity)
| extend SubCategory= extract('([a-zA-Z/-]*).*$',1,B)
| extend SubType= extract('([a-zA-Z/-]*) (.*)$',2,B)
| project SubType , EventCount

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Category By time
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet'
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Fortigate'
| extend Category=extract('(.*?):(.*?)$',1,Activity )
| summarize CatgoryCount=count() by Category, TimeGenerated

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Total Local Traffic Sent vs Received
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet'
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Fortigate'
| summarize SentDataMB = sumif(SentBytes,Activity contains 'local' )/1048576 , DataRecievedMB =sumif(ReceivedBytes, Activity contains 'local')/1048576 by TimeGenerated

content.PartTitle: Local data flow volume, by time

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Count by Traffic Forward Events
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet'
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Fortigate'
| summarize NumberOfEvent=count() by Activity
| extend Category= extract('(.*):(.*)$',1,Activity)
| extend B= extract('(.*):(.*$)',2,Activity)
| extend SubCategory= extract('([a-zA-Z/-]*).*$',1,B)
| extend SubType= extract('([a-zA-Z/-]*) (.*)$',2,B)
| where SubCategory contains 'forward' and SubType !in ('start','close')
| project SubType, NumberOfEvent

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//local vs Forwarded log count
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet'
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Fortigate'
| summarize NumberOfEvent=count() by Activity
| extend Category= extract('(.*):(.*)$',1,Activity)
| extend B= extract('(.*):(.*$)',2,Activity)
| extend SubCategory= extract('([a-zA-Z/-]*).*$',1,B)
| extend SubType= extract('([a-zA-Z/-]*) (.*)$',2,B)
| where Category contains 'traffic'
| project SubCategory , NumberOfEvent
| summarize Total= sum(NumberOfEvent) by SubCategory

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Forward Traffic by Allow vs Deny
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet'
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Fortigate'
| where Activity contains 'traffic:forward accept' or Activity contains 'traffic:forward deny'
| summarize TrafficCount= count() by Activity, TimeGenerated

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//data upload by category 
CommonSecurityLog 
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet'  
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Fortigate' 
| where RequestContext != ''  
| where Activity contains 'passthrough' 
| summarize DataSentMB=sum(SentBytes)/1048576 by  RequestContext 
| top 5 by DataSentMB  desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Top 5 URL Blocked 
CommonSecurityLog 
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet' 
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Fortigate' 
| where Activity contains 'utm:webfilter' 
| extend Url= extract(';FortinetFortiGatehostname=(.*?);',1,AdditionalExtensions) 
| extend Action= extract(';FortinetFortiGateaction=(.*?);',1,AdditionalExtensions) 
| where Action =='blocked' 
| summarize Count= count() by Url 
| top 5 by Count desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Top 5 URL Data Upload 
CommonSecurityLog 
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet' 
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Fortigate' 
| where Activity contains 'passthrough' 
| extend Url= extract(';FortinetFortiGatehostname=(.*?);',1,AdditionalExtensions) 
| summarize DataSent = sum(SentBytes) by Url 
| top 5 by DataSent desc

content.PartTitle: Top 5 URLs, by upload data volume

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Count by webfilter
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet'
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Fortigate'
| summarize NumberOfEvent=count() by Activity
| extend Category= extract('(.*):(.*)$',1,Activity)
| extend B= extract('(.*):(.*$)',2,Activity)
| extend SubCategory= extract('([a-zA-Z/-]*).*$',1,B)
| extend SubType= extract('([a-zA-Z/-]*) (.*)$',2,B)
| where SubCategory contains 'webfilter'
| project SubType, NumberOfEvent

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Top 5 Web Category Blocked 
CommonSecurityLog 
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet' 
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Fortigate' 
| where Activity contains 'utm:webfilter' 
| extend Url= extract(';FortinetFortiGatehostname=(.*?);',1,AdditionalExtensions) 
| extend Action= extract(';FortinetFortiGateaction=(.*?);',1,AdditionalExtensions) 
| where Action =='blocked' 
| where RequestContext != '' 
| summarize Count= count() by RequestContext 
| top 5 by Count desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Top 5 Category Data Download 
CommonSecurityLog 
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet' 
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Fortigate' 
| where Activity contains 'passthrough' 
| where RequestContext != '' 
| summarize DataRecievedMB=sum(ReceivedBytes)/1048576 by  RequestContext 
| top 5 by DataRecievedMB desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Top 5 Outbound Source IP Data Upload 
CommonSecurityLog 
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet' 
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Fortigate' 
| where Activity contains 'forward' 
| where DeviceInboundInterface == 'port2' 
| summarize DataSentMB= sum(SentBytes)/1048576 by SourceIP 
| top 5 by DataSentMB desc

content.PartTitle: Top 5 outbound source IP addresses, by upload data

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Top 5 Outbound Destination by Data Sent 
CommonSecurityLog 
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet' 
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Fortigate' 
| where Activity contains 'forward' 
| where DeviceInboundInterface == 'port2' 
| summarize DataSentMB= sum(SentBytes)/1048576 by DestinationIP 
| top 5 by DataSentMB desc

content.PartTitle: Top 5 outbound destination IP addresses, by sent data

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Top 5 Destination Inbound IP Address Data Received 
CommonSecurityLog 
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet' 
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Fortigate' 
| where Activity contains 'forward' 
| where DestinationTranslatedAddress != '' 
| where DeviceInboundInterface == 'port1' 
| summarize DataReceivedMB= sum(ReceivedBytes)/1048576 by DestinationTranslatedAddress 
| project-rename InboundDestination= DestinationTranslatedAddress 
| top 5 by DataReceivedMB  desc

content.PartTitle: Top 5 inbound destination IP addresses, by received data

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Top 5 Inbound Source Data Received 
CommonSecurityLog 
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet' 
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Fortigate' 
| where Activity contains 'forward' 
| where DeviceInboundInterface == 'port1' 
| summarize DataSent= sum(ReceivedBytes) by SourceIP 
| top 5 by DataSent desc

content.PartTitle: Top 5 inbound source IP addresses, by received data

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Top 5 Destination ports for outbound Traffic
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet'
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Fortigate'
| where Activity contains 'forward'
| where DeviceInboundInterface == 'port2'
| where DestinationPort > 0
| extend DestinationPorts= tostring(DestinationPort)
| summarize TopDestinationPortsCount= count() by DestinationPorts
| top 5 by TopDestinationPortsCount desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Top 5 Destination ports for Inbound Traffic
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet'
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Fortigate'
| where Activity contains 'forward'
| where DeviceInboundInterface == 'port1'
| where DestinationPort > 0
| extend DestinationPorts= tostring(DestinationPort)
| summarize TopDestinationPortsCount= count() by DestinationPorts
| top 5 by TopDestinationPortsCount  desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Top 5 Inbound Source IP 
CommonSecurityLog 
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet' 
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Fortigate' 
| where Activity contains 'forward' 
| where DeviceInboundInterface == 'port2' 
| summarize InBoundCount= count() by SourceIP 
| top 5 by InBoundCount desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Top 5 Outbound Source IP 
CommonSecurityLog 
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet' 
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Fortigate' 
| where Activity contains 'forward' 
| where DeviceInboundInterface == 'port1' 
| summarize OutBoundCount= count() by SourceIP 
| top 5 by OutBoundCount desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Top 5 Inbound Destination IP 
CommonSecurityLog 
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet' 
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Fortigate' 
| where Activity contains 'forward' 
| where DeviceInboundInterface == 'port1' 
| where DestinationTranslatedAddress contains '.' 
| summarize InBoundCount= count() by DestinationTranslatedAddress 
| project-rename DestinationIP= DestinationTranslatedAddress 
| top 5 by InBoundCount desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Top 5 Outbound Destination IP 
CommonSecurityLog 
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet' 
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Fortigate' 
| where Activity contains 'forward' 
| where DeviceInboundInterface == 'port2' 
| summarize OutBoundCount= count() by DestinationIP 
| top 5 by OutBoundCount desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//top 5 successful logins
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet'
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Fortigate'
| where DestinationUserName != ''
| where Activity == 'event:system login success'
| summarize Attempts=count() by DestinationUserName
| project-rename UserName= DestinationUserName
| top 5 by Attempts desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//top 5 Failed logins
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet'
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Fortigate'
| where DestinationUserName != ''
| where Activity == 'event:system login failed'
| summarize Attempts=count() by DestinationUserName
| project-rename UserName= DestinationUserName
| top 5 by Attempts desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//FortiGate Update Summary 
CommonSecurityLog 
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet' 
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Fortigate' 
| where Activity contains 'system' 
| where Activity contains 'update' 
| extend EventResult= extract(';FortinetFortiGatelogdesc=(.*?);',1, AdditionalExtensions) 
| summarize Count= count() by EventResult 
| top 5 by Count desc nulls last

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Firewall Config Edit Summary 
CommonSecurityLog 
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet' 
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Fortigate' 
| where Activity contains 'system' 
| where Activity contains 'edit' 
| extend EditType= extract(';FortinetFortiGatecfgpath=(.*?);',1, AdditionalExtensions) 
| summarize EditCount= count() by EditType 
| top 5 by EditCount desc nulls last

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Avg Concurrent Conn
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet'
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Fortigate'
| where Activity contains 'system'
| where Activity contains 'perf'
| extend ConcurrentSession= extract(';FortinetFortiGatetotalsession=(.*?);',1,AdditionalExtensions )
| summarize  Sessions=avg(toint(ConcurrentSession)) by  TimeGenerated

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Count by Traffic Local Events
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet'
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Fortigate'
| summarize NumberOfEvent=count() by Activity
| extend Category= extract('(.*):(.*)$',1,Activity)
| extend B= extract('(.*):(.*$)',2,Activity)
| extend SubCategory= extract('([a-zA-Z/-]*).*$',1,B)
| extend SubType= extract('([a-zA-Z/-]*) (.*)$',2,B)
| where SubCategory contains 'local' and SubType !in ('start','close')
| project SubType, NumberOfEvent

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//UTM distribution
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet'
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Fortigate'
| summarize NumberOfEvent=count() by Activity
| extend Category= extract('(.*):(.*)$',1,Activity)
| extend B= extract('(.*):(.*$)',2,Activity)
| extend SubCategory= extract('([a-zA-Z/-]*).*$',1,B)
| extend SubType= extract('([a-zA-Z/-]*) (.*)$',2,B)
| where Category contains 'utm'
| project SubCategory , NumberOfEvent
| summarize Total= sum(NumberOfEvent) by SubCategory

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Top Traffic Trend 
CommonSecurityLog 
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet' 
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Fortigate' 
| where Activity contains 'traffic' 
| summarize ActivityCount=count() by Activity 
| extend ActivtyType=extract('traffic:(.*)$',1,Activity) 
| project ActivtyType , ActivityCount 
| top 5 by ActivityCount desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Count by app-ctrl events
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet'
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Fortigate'
| summarize NumberOfEvent=count() by Activity
| extend Category= extract('(.*):(.*)$',1,Activity)
| extend B= extract('(.*):(.*$)',2,Activity)
| extend SubCategory= extract('([a-zA-Z/-]*).*$',1,B)
| extend SubType= extract('([a-zA-Z/-]*) (.*)$',2,B)
| where SubCategory contains 'app-ctrl'
| project SubType, NumberOfEvent

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Top protocol accepted
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet'
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Fortigate'
| where ApplicationProtocol != ''
| where Activity contains 'accept'
| summarize ProtocolCount = count() by ApplicationProtocol
|top 5 by ProtocolCount desc nulls last

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//top protocol denied
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet'
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Fortigate'
| where ApplicationProtocol != ''
| where Activity contains 'deny'
| summarize ProtocolCount = count() by ApplicationProtocol
|top 5 by ProtocolCount desc nulls last

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
// Top category of data
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet'
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Fortigate'
| summarize count() by Activity
| extend Category=extract('(.*?):(.*?)$',1,Activity )
| summarize CategoryCount=sum(count_) by Category
